meanings.definition: The act of offering to do something without being asked or obligated.
meanings.sent1: Volunteering at the animal shelter is a great way to help out in the community.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys volunteering at the local food bank every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: The children's faces lit up with joy when they saw the volunteers coming to play games with them.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to volunteering shines brightly in her commitment to helping others.
meanings.sent5: The impact of volunteering can be seen in the smiles of those who receive assistance.

meanings.definition: To offer oneself as a volunteer for a task or organization.
meanings.sent1: I will be volunteering at the event to help set up the decorations.
meanings.sent2: They are volunteering to clean up the park after the picnic.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would be volunteering to be the taste tester for the bake-off.
meanings.sent4: She is volunteering her time and skills to make a positive difference in the community.
meanings.sent5: Volunteering to help others is a selfless act that benefits everyone involved.
